info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 6:58PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cumberland, northeastern Prince Edward, northern Nottoway, Amelia and southwestern Powhatan Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 657 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms near Longwood University. These storms were moving slowly east. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Guinea Mills around 720 PM EDT. Rice around 725 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Raines Tavern, North Wellville, Angola, Oak Forest, Earls, Winterham, Hawk, Kingsville, Maplewood and Grays Siding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
